speaker: Kevin
text: I'm doing great. What about you?

speaker: Nathalie
text: I'm doing well too. So, what do you want to discuss about Recap?

speaker: Kevin
text: I think we should discuss our marketing strategy for the upcoming quarter.

speaker: Nathalie
text: That sounds like a good idea. What do you have in mind?

speaker: Kevin
text: I was thinking of focusing on social media campaigns and influencer marketing.

speaker: Nathalie
text: That's a great idea. We should also look into email marketing and search engine optimization.

speaker: Kevin

speaker: Kevin
